title: Polska Malca - (Tapes & Live)
description:
SpiritCore band Polska Malca started in 1982 with 4 members. It was the first Punk/Hardcore band in this area (Posavje). It was formed by a bass player Gianni. Their first song was called Anti Humanist which came out on a tape "from Plac with Love". The group worked with a few brakes, but was constantly together until 1994.
